snippet: The British bank HSBC said first-quarter earnings almost doubled, to $8.43 billion, after the firm benefited from reduced costs and a decline in bad debts.
abstract: The British bank HSBC said first-quarter earnings almost doubled, to $8.43 billion, after the firm benefited from reduced costs and a decline in bad debts.

headline.main: HSBC Profit Surges as Restructuring Plan Gains Traction
